definition: money is omnipotent (idiom)/with money, you can do anything/money talks
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Qian
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
surname Wan
ten thousand/a great number
see 万俟[Mo4 qi2]
surname Neng
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: When moneys speaks the truth is silent.
sentences.chinese: 当金钱万能时，真理无言。

sentences.english: I am wiser than to believe what you call money talks.
sentences.chinese: 我不至于可笑到相信你所谓的金钱万能的说法。
你怎样能证明“金钱万能”？

sentences.english: I don't believe your theory of"money tells".
sentences.chinese: 我不信你说的什么金钱万能的道理。

sentences.english: Money talks way too loud in our country.
sentences.chinese: 在我国，金钱万能太占上风了。

sentences.english: Do you believe money is everything?
That money talks, I'll not deny.
sentences.chinese: 金钱万能，这点我不想否认。

definition: money worship
to put money above everything else
lit. money will make the Devil turn millstones (idiom)/fig. with money, you can do anything you like
pinyin: you3 qian2 neng2 shi3 gui3 tui1 mo4

definition: the notion in society that it's better to get ahead in the world by abandoning one's scruples than to suffer poverty/lit. despising poverty but not prostitution (idiom)
money is all-powerful/money can move God
utilitarianism
caring only about money and wealth
utilitarianism
the root of all evil
to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
social Darwinism
pinyin: she4 hui4 Da2 er3 wen2 zhu3 yi4

definition: variant of 唯利是圖|唯利是图[wei2 li4 shi4 tu2]
moral bankruptcy/moral degeneracy
to worship money/to be mad about money
cynic
to open one's eyes wide at the sight of profit (idiom); thinking of nothing but personal gain/money-grubbing
